long_description: When you come-a-knockin' this frame will be rockin'! The creative Kinetic Rock-N-Roll bike trainer moves and grooves with you as you ride. Unique progressive damping supports riders of any weight, and self-centers the rider for natural pedaling actions. Floating pivot provides a natural ride; frame moves and rocks from side to side with the rider. Forces core muscle use to maintain proper balance while riding; makes any rider a more powerful and faster cyclist. Measurable and repeatable workloads. Resistance unit is driven by magnets; fluid unit is completely sealed and will not leak. Clamp-and-lock quick-release lever secures bike easily. Custom-made PVC feet. Removable legs for easy storage. Turntable Riser Ring is recommended for use with trainer, sold separately.
short_description: When you come-a-knockin' this frame will be rockin'! The creative Kinetic Rock-N-Roll bike trainer moves and grooves with you as you ride.
